scripts.install: echo '=== Debug: Current directory ===' && pwd && echo '=== Debug: Directory contents ===' && ls -la && echo '=== Debug: Checking for frontend directory ===' && if [ -d 'house-fronted' ]; then echo 'house-fronted directory found' && cd house-fronted && npm ci; else echo 'ERROR: house-fronted directory not found' && exit 1; fi
scripts.build: echo '=== Debug: Build started ===' && pwd && ls -la && if [ -d 'house-fronted' ]; then echo 'Building frontend...' && cd house-fronted && npm run build; else echo 'ERROR: house-fronted directory not found during build' && exit 1; fi
